snippet: Word of the detentions came as German authorities warned against a rise in attacks on shelters for some of the thousands of refugees who have been entering the country.
abstract: Bavarian police seize 13 right-wing extremists, along with array of weapons, including detonators, in series of raids that apparently disrupt plans to attack some of refugees pouring into Germany; at least three people are arrested and charged and 10 others detained.

keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: Word of the detentions came as German authorities warned against a rise in attacks on shelters for some of the thousands of refugees who have been entering the country.

headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Germany: Anti-Refugee Plot Disrupted, Officials Say
headline.main: 13 in Custody in Germany in Possible Plot to Attack Refugees
